      • moveBlock

        public void moveBlock(BaseSTBBlock stb,
             Location oldLoc,
             Location newLoc)
        Move an existing STB block to a new location. Note that this method doesn't do any redrawing of blocks.
        Parameters:
        oldLoc - the STB block's old location
        newLoc - the STB block's new location

      • get

        public BaseSTBBlock get(Location loc)
        Get the STB block at the given location.
        Parameters:
        loc - the location to check at
        Returns:
        the STB block at the given location, or null if no matching item

      • get

        public BaseSTBBlock get(Location loc,
               boolean checkSigns)
        Get the STB block at the given location, or if the location contains a sign, possibly at the location the sign is attached to.
        Parameters:
        loc - the location to check at
        checkSigns - if true, and the location contains a sign, check at the location that the sign is attached to
        Returns:
        the STB block at the given location, or null if no matching item

      • get

        public <T extends BaseSTBBlock> T get(Location loc,
                             Class<T> type)
        Get the STB block of the given type at the given location.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a subclass of BaseSTBBlock
        Parameters:
        loc - the location to check at
        type - the type of STB block required
        Returns:
        the STB block at the given location, or null if no matching item

      • get

                             Class<T> type,
                             boolean checkSigns)
        Get the STB block of the given type at the given location.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a subclass of BaseSTBBlock
        Parameters:
        loc - the location to check at
        type - the type of STB block required
        checkSigns - if true, and the location contains a sign, check at the location that the sign is attached to
        Returns:
        the STB block at the given location, or null if no matching item

      • loadDeferredBlocks

        public void loadDeferredBlocks(String type)
                        throws SQLException
        Load all blocks for the given block type. Called when a block is registered after the initial DB load is done.
        Parameters:
        type - the block type
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there is a problem loading from the DB

      • worldUnloaded

        public void worldUnloaded(World world)
        The given world has just become unloaded..
        Parameters:
        world - the world that has been unloaded

      • worldLoaded

        public void worldLoaded(World world)
        The given world has just become loaded.
        Parameters:
        world - the world that has been loaded

      • listBlocks

        public List<BaseSTBBlock> listBlocks(World world,
                            boolean sorted)
        Get a list of all STB blocks for the given world.
        Parameters:
        world - the world to query
        sorted - if true, the array is sorted by block type
        Returns:
        an array of STB block objects

      • getAverageTimePerTick

        public long getAverageTimePerTick()
        Get the average time in nanoseconds that the plugin has spent ticking tickable blocks since the plugin started up.
        Returns:
        the average time spent ticking blocks

      • setSaveInterval

        public void setSaveInterval(int saveInterval)
        Set the save interval; any changes will be written to the persisted DB this often.
        Parameters:
        saveInterval - the save interval, in seconds.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shut down the location manager after ensuring all pending changes are written to the DB, and the DB thread has exited. This may block the main thread for a short time, but should only be called when the plugin is being disabled.
